column2:
"Poppoâ™ª It's Popona!
I'm really glad I came to Oracle, but..."

"But I just remembered something terrible...
This world has Darkers, doesn't it?!"
"There are Darkers that look like insects, aren't there? Ones that crawl, ones that fly...!"
"I'm terrified of insects! If I run into a giant insect like that, I'll pass out and be devoured for sure!"
"This is the most important request I will ever make! Destroy that insect-like Darker for me!"
